description: The nature of law of tort. Intentional torts against the person. Torts in relation to land, enjoyment of land & chattels. Introduction to the tort of negligence (including modification by the Civil Liability Act 2003 (Qld)).
restricted: LLB(Hons)(#64), LLB(Hons)(#48), LLB(Hons)#64 duals, LLB, LLB duals and LLB (Graduate Entry) programs.
